virtual void playing (bool playing)

Detailed Description

This device plays back through SDL, the simple direct media layer.

Definition at line 40 of file AUD_SDLDevice.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AUD_SDLDevice::AUD_SDLDevice ( AUD_DeviceSpecs  specs,
int  buffersize = AUD_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE 
)

Opens the SDL audio device for playback.

Parameters:
specsThe wanted audio specification.
buffersizeThe size of the internal buffer.
Note:
The specification really used for opening the device may differ.
Exceptions:
AUD_ExceptionThrown if the audio device cannot be opened.
